response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds significant worth to me, but I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and interests. I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special price tailored to your budget. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $800,000 for you to consider. I understand that the product is valued at $1,000,000 to you, so I hope this offer reflects a fair compromise. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 800000}
